title: Uptown Kitchen
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American diner food with a few ovo-lacto vegetarian sandwiches and pizza. Breakfast and lunch all day. Spacious interior with a large bar area. Vegans need to specify, and chef will accommodate. Uses some organic ingredients. Moved from 303 Florence Ave. Lunch prices are moderate, dinner more expensive.
